.. enums

####################
Global Enumerators
####################

Perhaps the only truly global parameters that we will be using - these define integer aliases for a number of finite lists. 

Because of the way that default-labelled enums work, we also take this opportunity to `count' the number of elements in the arrays, using the final entry as a counting marker.

.. doxygenenum:: ElementID

.. doxygenenum:: SourceProcess
